import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import './MusicPlayerCard.scss' import PlayButton from "../PlayButton/PlayButton"; import audios from "../Song/Song"; import {AiFillPauseCircle, AiFillPlayCircle, BiSkipNext, BiSkipPrevious, FaRandom, FiRepeat} from "react-icons/all"; const MusicPlayerCard =()=>{ const img1='https://www.fillmurray.com/500/500'; const [song]=useState(audios) const [index,setIndex]=useState([]); const [currentsong,setCurrentsong]=useState() function clickCard(numb) { console.log(numb) setIndex(numb); setCurrentsong(song[numb]) } useEffect(()=>{ setCurrentsong(song[index]) console.log('index'+index) },[index]) return(
{song.map((item,numb)=>
clickCard(numb)} className="song-title">{item.tilte}
{item.author}
{numb}
)}
setCurrentTime(e.target.value)} defaultValue='0' type="range" min='0' max={lengthTime[1]} className="slider" id="myRange"/>
{changeTime}
Why not me
{lengthTime[0]}
{isPlay==false ? {setIsPlay(!isPlay)}} className=' play-btn text-5xl flex-initial'/> : setIsPlay(!isPlay)} className=' play-btn text-5xl flex-initial'/>}
setIsRandom(!isRandom)} className='random-btn m-2 ' style={isRandom ? clickedStyle : notClickedStyle}/> setIsRepeat(!isRepeat)} className='repeat-btn m-2 ' style={isRepeat ? clickedStyle : notClickedStyle}/>
) } export default MusicPlayerCard
